contents.text: 2) Results: a) UCF sports dataset: We firstly tested the performance of the LSTM with soft attention proposed in [15] on the UCF sports dataset and obtained 70.0% accuracy. All the experimental settings are the same as these in [15]. Then we evaluated the proposed four approaches mentioned previously. HM-AN with stochastic hard attention which is realized with REINFORCE-like algorithm improves the results to 82.0%. HM-AN with soft attention is similar to the REINFORCE- Hard Attention, with accuracy results of 81.1%.
